heading: BECOME A HOTEL LIVING AGENT
paragraph_1:
This is a one-time action. You can contact and register as many hotels as you want in your panel. For each one that joins Hotel Living within the next 30 days, you'll start receiving automatic commissions for 30 months.
You set the pace. The limit is you.
(During the meeting or visit, if the hotel is ready, you can even help them register on the spot. One conversation can turn into 30 months of automatic income.)
commissions: Automatic commissions: 0.5% for the first 18 months and 0.25% for the next 12 months.
panel_description: In your dashboard you can monitor all contacted hotels, see their status, and track your commissions.
bank_data: You must add your bank account number in your profile to receive monthly payments.
join_now_description: Start your journey as a Hotel Living agent and generate passive income for 30 months for each hotel you register.
